title: Official Blind Review #2
review_assessment:_checking_correctness_: I assessed the sensibility of the derivations and theory.
review:
This paper introduces a method combining the lexicon-based feature and character ngram model for handling negation in Amharic sentiment classification. The algorithmic contribution is demonstrated in a Amharic dataset.

My rating for this paper is Reject because there is no novelty in the approach, it introduces some rules to build a FSA plus a logistic regression model with character-level ngram feature. It is also lack of argument/motivation why the proposed model is special and specific to the problem. The experiment only compares with two baselines in single dataset, which is also not convincing.
